name: fisiomuv-recovery
description: Monorepo para FisioMuv Recovery Landing Page

scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.postbuild:copy: rm -rf backend/public && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run postbuild:copy

author: FisioMuv Team
